about_the_game:
Based on 'The Shadow over Innsmouth' by master of horror H.P. Lovecraft, and inspired by the classic gameplay of the early 90s' Lucasarts adventures, Chronicle of Innsmouth sets you on a path to discover the secrets of the cursed town of Innsmouth. The second chapter of this franchise, Mountains of Madness, will be available on Steam very soon – you can already Wishlist and follow it here.

The story begins with a trip through New England. At the Newburyport station, you hear for the first time about the fishing town of Innsmouth – once a rich and thriving port, now a decadent forsaken place, surrounded by rumors about disappearances, hidden cults and all kinds of unspeakable horrors.

.

Moved by sheer curiosity, you decided to investigate the truth behind these odd stories. But Innsmouth and its inhabitants guard its secrets carefully – and the truth might be a burden too heavy for anyone's sanity. Investigate, gather information and solve enigmas and puzzles to get to the bottom of all the mysteries of Innsmouth – if you dare, for you may find answers you would have preferred not to hear.

highlighted.name: A Man Walks Into A Bar.

detailed_description:
Mountains of Madness will be released on February 16th!

Mountains of Madness , the sequel of Chronicle of Innsmouth today unveils its release date, which is now officially set for February 16th. The game will be available on Steam for the price of 17.99€/19.99$ (with a 10% launch discount).

Wishlist the game now, it would be a tremendous help!


Chronicle of Innsmouth Deluxe Edition release on 29 September 2017

We'll be back in September concerning this terrifying revelation: COIS will be released in a Deluxe version entirely voice-acted in English!

This update will be available free for all owners of the current !

Please note that your old saved games from the original version of Chronicle Of Innsmouth will not work once you upgrade to the deluxe version.

If you feel the need to preserve your old saved games for future reference then you will have to make seperate backups of them as well as a seperate backup of the original game itself to run them on.


Spanish Translation and bugfix.

Finally a new build with gilman's totem bugfix and Spanish translation thanks to lobo.rojo and walas74.
